mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select * from board order by bgroup desc,bstep asc ) a ) where rnum>=1 and rnum<=20

select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select * from board order by bgroup desc,bstep asc ) a ) where rnum=( select rnum from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select * from board order by bgroup desc,bstep asc ) a ) where bno=#{bno} )+1

select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select * from board order by bgroup desc,bstep asc ) a ) where rnum=( select rnum from ( select rownum rnum, a.* from ( select * from board order by bgroup desc,bstep asc ) a ) where bno=#{bno} )-1
mapper.insert: insert into board values (board_seq.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, sysdate, #{id}, board_seq.currval,0,0,1, #{bfile})
